title: XOR Me Maybe
description:
The following hex string was XOR-encrypted with the repeating key 'NCL':

22292c227b1c2d3a2a7e1c363a213a3b31362e377e

Decrypt it to find the flag.

Hint: XOR each byte of the ciphertext with the corresponding byte of the repeating key.
hints: XOR encryption uses the same operation for both encryption and decryption
Key 'NCL' = bytes [0x4E, 0x43, 0x4C], repeat it to match ciphertext length
Python: bytes([c ^ key[i % len(key)] for i, c in enumerate(ciphertext)])
